details.Execution Plan:
Aggregate  (cost=21328.02..21328.03 rows=1 width=32)
  ->  Aggregate  (cost=21328.00..21328.01 rows=1 width=32)
        ->  Nested Loop Left Join  (cost=25.03..21323.75 rows=850 width=68)
              ->  Seq Scan on author "%0_authors"  (cost=0.00..18.50 rows=850 width=36)
              ->  Subquery Scan on "%3_rows"  (cost=25.03..25.06 rows=1 width=32)
                    ->  Aggregate  (cost=25.03..25.04 rows=1 width=32)
                          ->  Seq Scan on article "%2_articles"  (cost=0.00..25.00 rows=6 width=32)
                                Filter: ("%0_authors".id = author_id)
details.SQL Query:
EXPLAIN
SELECT
  coalesce(json_agg(row_to_json("%5_universe")), '[]') AS "universe"
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      *
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          coalesce(json_agg(row_to_json("%6_rows")), '[]') AS "rows"
        FROM
          (
            SELECT
              "%0_authors"."id" AS "author_id",
              "%0_authors"."first_name" AS "first_name",
              "%1_RELATIONSHIP_Articles"."Articles" AS "Articles"
            FROM
              "public"."author" AS "%0_authors"
              LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL (
                SELECT
                  row_to_json("%1_RELATIONSHIP_Articles") AS "Articles"
                FROM
                  (
                    SELECT
                      *
                    FROM
                      (
                        SELECT
                          coalesce(json_agg(row_to_json("%3_rows")), '[]') AS "rows"
                        FROM
                          (
                            SELECT
                              "%2_articles"."title" AS "title"
                            FROM
                              "public"."article" AS "%2_articles"
                            WHERE
                              ("%0_authors"."id" = "%2_articles"."author_id")
                          ) AS "%3_rows"
                      ) AS "%3_rows"
                  ) AS "%1_RELATIONSHIP_Articles"
              ) AS "%1_RELATIONSHIP_Articles" ON ('true')
          ) AS "%6_rows"
      ) AS "%6_rows"
  ) AS "%5_universe"
